result.execSummary:
All charges against Larry Green Hamilton in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Larry Green Hamilton is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Larry Green Hamilton

records.addlTxt: Defendant Larry Green Hamilton not in court, in custody.  Attorney Lori Ann Kuehn in court for Larry Green Hamilton.  Prosecuting attorney Samuel E. Simpson in court for the State of Wisconsin. State is moving to dismiss, defendant is being federally indicted. Court vacates stayed warrant and orders case DISMISSED.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Discharge Summary Report received and filed.  nk

Defendant Larry Green Hamilton not in court.  Attorney Lori Ann Kuehn in court for Larry Green Hamilton.  Attorney Erika Strebel in court for State of Wisconsin on behalf of Attorney Michael R Staskunas. 

Case in court for a scheduling conference.  Defendant does not appear.  Defense informs the Court that defendant may have been federally indicted but is unsure.  Prosecutor assigned to case not present in court to confirm.  Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date.  Case adjourned to Branch 36, Rm 316 SB.
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Supervision Report 9-12-2022
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Status Report 8-25-2022

Defendant Larry Green Hamilton in court, appear by video with attorney Lori Ann Kuehn, appear by video.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded. Court took Judical Notice to case 11CF2979. Sworn for the State: MPD Officer R. Casey.    State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 38.  All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Laura A. Crivello, Branch 36,  in Room 608 of the Courthouse.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Received and Filed: Attorney Lori Kuehn
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

efendant Larry Green Hamilton in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Defendant Larry Green Hamilton in custody.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Larry Green Hamilton appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Laura A. Crivello, Branch 36,  in Room 608 of the Courthouse.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
